activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11835
activity.text: Hey @rithviknishad, I would like to take this issue. I had made the ui changes for the delete card but as this facility is available only for superusers, is there any attribute in the user model for their role so that I can render the card only for the superusers optionally.
